table_description: This is the main metadata table provided by idc-index. Each row corresponds to a DICOM series, and contains attributes at the collection, patient, study, and series levels. The table also contains download-related attributes, such as the AWS S3 bucket and URL to download the series.

columns.name: collection_id
columns.description: short string with the identifier of the collection the series belongs to

columns.name: analysis_result_id
columns.description: this string is not empty if the specific series is part of an analysis results collection; analysis results can be added to a given collection over time

columns.name: PatientID
columns.description: identifier of the patient within the collection (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: SeriesInstanceUID
columns.description: unique identifier of the DICOM series (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: StudyInstanceUID
columns.description: unique identifier of the DICOM study (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: source_DOI
columns.description: Digital Object Identifier of the dataset that contains the given series; follow this DOI to learn more about the activity that produced this series

columns.name: PatientAge
columns.description: age of the subject at the time of imaging (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: PatientSex
columns.description: subject sex (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: StudyDate
columns.description: date of the study (de-identified) (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: StudyDescription
columns.description: textual description of the study content (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: BodyPartExamined
columns.description: body part imaged (not applicable for SM series) (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: Modality
columns.description: acquisition modality (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: Manufacturer
columns.description: manufacturer of the equipment that produced the series (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: ManufacturerModelName
columns.description: model name of the equipment that produced the series (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: SeriesDate
columns.description: date of the series (de-identified) (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: SeriesDescription
columns.description: textual description of the series content (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: SeriesNumber
columns.description: series number (DICOM attribute)

columns.name: instanceCount
columns.description: number of instances in the series

columns.name: license_short_name
columns.description: short name of the license that applies to this series

columns.name: aws_bucket
columns.description: name of the AWS S3 bucket that contains the series

columns.name: crdc_series_uuid
columns.description: unique identifier of the series within the IDC

columns.name: series_aws_url
columns.description: public AWS S3 URL to download the series in bulk (each instance is a separate file)

columns.name: series_size_MB
columns.description: total size of the series in megabytes
